install.name: 2J Tabs
install.author: Dron (2joomla.net)
install.description: 2JoomlaNet specialize in creating quality Joomla 1.0.x and Joomla 1.5 Native extension with user friendly interfaces.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: A content cateogry

param.name: secid
param.label: Section
param.description: A content Section

param.name: load_module
param.label: Modules positions
param.description: please specify modules postions from which tabs should load modules (Modules positions could be specified few ways using delimiter for example: left#; rigth#; user1#; delimiter is #; or you can write single value per line, without any delimiter), it's working this way in the case if you select Modules positions value in Select content from option

param.name: load_module_style
param.label: Output style for module position
param.description: If selected output into tabs modules position, with this option you can select output way

param.name: content_count_word
param.label: Intro length (in symbols)
param.description: Here you can set amount of the symbols which will be showed from the begin of the article

param.name: content_count_cut_word
param.label: Cut mid-word
param.description: In the case if you select Yes, then it cut off words in the middle in the case No words will not be cut mid-word. This option working when you specify length of the intro text in Intro length option

param.name: image
param.label: Show images
param.description: Display content item images

param.name: show_autor
param.label: Show Author
param.description: Display author name in content

param.name: show_created
param.label: Show creation date
param.description: Display date of creation in content

param.name: show_modified
param.label: Show modified date
param.description: Display date of modification in content

param.name: show_fulltext
param.label: Show full text
param.description: Display full text of the article, not only intro text

param.name: item_title
param.label: Item Title
param.description: Show item title

param.name: link_titles
param.label: Linked Titles
param.description: Make the Item titles linkable

param.name: readmore
param.label: Show Read More
param.description: Show/Hide the Read More button

param.name: items
param.label: Maximum articles amount
param.description: 0 - unlimited amount of articles

param.name: items_inpage
param.label: Amount of articles on page
param.description: Here you can set amount of articles which will be showed on every page 0 - unlimited amount of articles

param.name: orderby
param.label: Order by
param.description: this option make you able to set order for showing articles from the category : random, order by date, order by ID

param.name: all_width
param.label: Tabs block width
param.description: Value could be set in pixels for example: 12px or in percents for example: 50% in the case if value stay empty it will be 100% by deafult

param.name: all_height
param.label: Tabs block height
param.description: Value could be set in pixels for example: 12px or in percents for example: 50% in the case if value stay empty it will be 100% by deafult

param.name: div_height
param.label: Tab content height
param.description: Value could be set in pixels for example: 12px or in percents for example: 50% in the case if value stay empty it will be 100% by deafult

param.name: pend_all_left
param.label: Tabs block left margin
param.description: Please specify values for this options in pixels ( set just number , without any px or pix or anything else. For example: Tabs panel left margin: 12)

param.name: pend_all_right
param.label: Tabs block right margin
param.description: Please specify values for this options in pixels ( set just number , without any px or pix or anything else. For example: Tabs panel left margin: 12)

param.name: pend_all_top
param.label: Tabs block top margin
param.description: Please specify values for this options in pixels ( set just number , without any px or pix or anything else. For example: Tabs panel left margin: 12)

param.name: pend_all_bottom
param.label: Tabs block bottom margin
param.description: Please specify values for this options in pixels ( set just number , without any px or pix or anything else. For example: Tabs panel left margin: 12)

param.name: titleintab
param.label: Tabs Labels
param.description: In the case if you select 'Article Title' value then tabs labels will be set from name of the articles, in the case if you select 'Index' value tabs lables will be implemented as template based index. Template for this case you can set in 'Tab Label Template' option

param.name: tab_template
param.label: Tab Label Template
param.description: Use symbol # for index, it will be replaced by index for every tab

param.name: custom_label
param.label: Custom labels
param.description: You can specify here custom labels for the tabs (Custom labels could be specified few ways using delimiter for example: First tab#; Second tab#; Third tab#; namely delimiter is #; or you can write single value per line, without any delimiter)

param.name: tab_name_cut
param.label: Length of the Tabs label
param.description: when field is empty, length of the label stay as is

param.name: enable_hover
param.label: Enable hover
param.description: Show/Hide the Read More button

param.name: font_tab
param.label: Tab label font
param.description: If this option leave empty, then this styles will be the same as specifyed in template CSS styles

param.name: font_size_tab
param.label: Tab label font size
param.description: If this option leave empty, then this styles will be the same as specifyed in template CSS styles

param.name: pending_need
param.label: Padding
param.description: you have 2 ways to set value for this option using css style or set it here in pixels

param.name: pre_text
param.label: Pre-Text
param.description: Pre-Text It's HTML value which you can add to the module , this text will be showed before module

param.name: post_text
param.label: Post-Text
param.description: Post-Text It's HTML value which you can add to the module , this text will be showed after module

param.name: template
param.label: Custom Template for article
param.description: Here's the list of the tags which you can use for customizing of the template: @@ID@@ - it's ID of the article, @@TEXT@@ - it's text of the article, @@READMORE@@ - tag for inserting of the standard ReadMore link (standard joomla read more link with HTML tag A), @@LINKREADMORE@@ - tag for inserting readmore link (you can use it in any custom code), @@CREATEDATE@@ - tag for inserting of the creation date, @@AUTHOR@@ - tag for inserting of the author name, @@AUTHORID@@ - tag of the author ID, @@MODIFIEDDATE@@ - tag for inserting date of the last modification

param.name: bg_color
param.label: Background color
param.description: This option could be helful in the case if you have some problems with some transparent elements of the tabs. You can specify custom background color in this case.

param.name: effect
param.label: Effect
param.description: Select Effect for this module
